file_content.text: Welcome back. Recon says you've been wreaking havoc on the Republic forces.
The colony's been pretty well decimated, aside from some civilians fleeing for their lives. That'll leave something for the Imperials to do.
Now settlers'll be clawing over each other for a shuttle off this sewer of a planet.
Your bounty. Good stack of credits by the look of it.
Let me know if you or the Empire need anything else cleaned up.
Always looking for more.
And let you hog all the glory? I don't think so.
Thanks again for the tip.
My pleasure.
Easy money.
Consider it a warm-up.
Good hunting.
We'll handle things from here. Mandalore will have his traitor.
I just dispatched a unit to retrieve the traitor from you. What are you doing down here?
Torian told me you managed to catch the traitor. The boy can hold his head a little higher now.
Good hunting, champion.
I've given you all the time I can.
Su'cuy gar, vod. What brings me the honor of having Mandalore's chosen in my camp?
Well, this is an unexpected honor. What brings the victor of the Great Hunt to my camp?
Thanks for the warm welcome.
And you are...?
Al'verde Vorten Fett. I'm coordinating our operation with Darth Gravus's forces.
Al'verde Vorten Fett. Commander of the Mandalorian assault on Taris.
So I'll ask again: what brings you to my war zone?
I'm here for the traitor.
Confidentiality is a concern, you understand.
No offense intended.
This invasion's interfering with my business. I expect you to make it up to me.
You're stepping on my toes.
I'm hunting Jicoln Cadera. You know anything that can help me find him?
I need intel about a target.
The traitor? No, no sightings, but then, we don't pay attention to ghosts.
Jicoln's a lingering shame best forgotten... you believe he's still alive?
That's what I've been led to believe.
So the job says.
Dead. Alive. I just need something to bring back.
I don't suppose it matters.
For the moment.
Not for long.
You could be in for some competition. I've got at least a thousand men who'd like to claim that honor.
Better keep this to ourselves, I want my troops following orders not chasing rumors.
If the traitor's alive, it would make some sense. His son was with us until recently. Disappeared.
Disappeared how, exactly?
Sounds suspicious.
His son happen to be named Torian?
I may have met Jicoln's kid.
Done your homework, then? Yes, Torian.
Jicoln's kid have a name?
Who's his son?
Torian. He came to Taris along with the rest of my men.
Showed a lot of promise in spite of his heritage. It was a shame to lose him so soon.
What happened with Torian's disappearance?
How'd he vanish?
Torian's a member of your clan?
How'd he end up with you?
No. After the traitors were crushed the remnants of their clans were brought back into the fold. Children mostly. Torian was one so fortunate.
Taking a traitor's kin to war doesn't seem real bright.
Bringing him was a bad idea.
Torian was a child when Jicoln acted against Mandalore. We've raised him as our own.
Kid disappears where his father's exiled... yeah, I'd bet there's a connection.
This just occurring to you?
Mandalore may show you favor, but I still outrank you. Don't force me to embarrass us both by having you flogged.
Stow your attitude if you expect my assistance. I'm not here to serve you.
The boy went missing in action while scouting a nearby Republic colony.
Torian was assumed killed or captured by the enemy, but I can't discount the possibility that the traitor was involved.
You believe I'll find something at this Republic colony?
That his last known location?
Sounds like as good a place as any to get started.
I'll have to check it out.
Hardly very helpful.
Well, a search of the area couldn't hurt. If nothing else, wiping out the colony could earn you a tidy sum.
The Imperials want a slaughter, and they're offering credits for Tarisian bodies.
Your assistance is appreciated, Commander.
You've been helpful.
You're a man after my own heart, Commander.
[Flirt] Good suggestion, sir.
Come see me personally when you want your credits for the Protectorate. I'll have them waiting.
I'll keep that in mind.
This is the location of the Second Colonial Protectorate. You can claim any bounties next time you come through camp.
The Empire can do their own dirty work.
That's not why I'm here.
If any of the Republic forces happen to find themselves in the way of your blaster then, you can claim your credits from me.
You'll stay out of my command tent, Imperial, if you value your head.
If you intend to fraternize with my forces, do it outside of my command tent.
I'm marshaling troops. Your business will have to wait.
Reports on the Cathar, sir....
